claim: Flublok is produced using a novel production platform in which recombinant HA is expressed in insect cells using a baculovirus expression vector system (BEVS).

combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote identifies RIV4 as a recombinant HA vaccine, which is the category that includes Flublok. This supports the claim that Flublok is produced using a recombinant technology platform.
